name: Micro Mayhem - For GDevelop Weekend Jam
name_original: Micro Mayhem - For GDevelop Weekend Jam
description:
https://liluo.io/fatalexit/micro-mayhem

Important: Enter a name at the main menu and click the Set Name button if you wanna be on the leaderboards! Made solo in less than 1 day by Fatal Exit. All Art, Music, SFX and Code were created in that day. Fonts by Kenney. A selection of mini games - try to get the best score you can on each! Compete for a spot on the Leaderboards for each game! Controls: Escape to go back/return to main menu. R to restart your chosen game. Everything else is controlled with Left mouse button. Tips: In Block Move, drag the blocks to the blue zone. In Smiley, click the odd one out. In Crank That, spin that crank by dragging with the mouse.
